title: Church Administrator Job at Open Access Consulting Limited
content:
Open Access Consulting Limited - Our client is a vibrant Pentecostal church with thriving branches in Lagos, Nigeria and Texas, USA. They are committed to spreading the Gospel with excellence and power, building lives through the Word, worship, and service across continents.

They are seeking spirit-filled, qualified, and God-fearing individuals to join their growing ministry team in the capacity below:

Job Position: Church Administrator
Job Location: Lagos

Job Role
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	To oversee the day-to-day administrative operations of the church, ensuring smooth, efficient, and spirit-led service delivery.


Job Description


	Manage office operations, including scheduling meetings, maintaining records, and handling correspondence.
	Coordinate internal communications among departments.
	Supervise administrative support staff.
	Maintain church membership records, finances, and inventory logs.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Office Management, or a related field.
	Certification in Administrative Management is an added advantage.


Other Requirements:


	Mature Christian with good knowledge of church operations.
	Ability to work discreetly and maintain confidentiality.


Required Skills:


	Strong administrative and organizational skills.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and database management.
	Excellent written and oral communication skills.
	Problem-solving and multitasking abilities.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: career@openaccessconsult.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: If you have a passion for kingdom work, spiritual integrity, and professional competence, we invite you to apply for the role above.

title: Sales Representative Job at Starich Recycling Technology Limited
content:
Starich Recycling Technology Company Limited, established in 2018 and located in Abia State, Nigeria, is a subsidiary of RSIN Group which entered Africa in 2008. By advanced plastic recycling technology, production equipment and excellent personnel team, Starich has become a leading manufacturer of plastic products, chemical fiber and textile products in Nigeria. Our main products include: chemical fibers, PET bottles, strapping bands, woven bags, mattresses, crawling mats, 4-piece bedding sets (excluding duvets), and more.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Representative

Job Location: Zaria, Kaduna
Employment Type: Full-time
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Description


	Generating Leads and Prospecting: Identifying potential customers and qualifying leads.
	Building Relationships: Establishing and maintaining positive relationships with clients.
	Presenting and Demonstrating: Sharing product information and demonstrating how a product or service meets customer needs.
	Negotiating and Closing Deals: Negotiating contracts, prices, and terms of sale.
	Achieving Sales Targets: Meeting or exceeding individual and team sales goals.
	Providing Customer Support: Answering questions, addressing concerns, and providing ongoing support.
	Tracking and Reporting: Monitoring sales activity and reporting on performance.


Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess an HND / Bachelor's Degree with 3-5 years of experience.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: Stellarinternationaljobs@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Business Development & Sales Executive Job at Sttrutt Integrated Services Limited
content:
Sttrutt Integrated Services Limited is a QHSES consulting firm providing expert advisory, training, auditing, and compliance solutions to businesses in Nigeria and beyond.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development & Sales Executive
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Aims and Objectives
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Identify, research and evaluate customer needs and potential clients
	Develop and maintain client relationships
	Develop mutually beneficial proposals
	Negotiate contract terms with clients and communicate with stakeholders Monitor project teams to ensure contracts are executed as agreed
	Develop and manage strategic partnerships to grow business
	Track and report on the status of proposal components
	Gather useful information from customer and competitor data
	Make and give presentations to prospective clients on services offered
	Track, identify and add qualified prospects to sales pipeline
	Conduct ongoing market research
	Work with the pricing department to create rate proposals
	Drive the end-to-end sales process
	Prepare and submit sales contracts
	Actively seek out new sales opportunities through cold calling, networking, and social media
	Create frequent reviews and reports with sales and financial data
	Ensure the availability of stock for sales and demonstrations
	Participate on behalf of the company in exhibitions or conferences
	Manage social media accounts of SISL to drive content and sales.


Requirements and Skills


	Proven experience as a Sales Executive or relevant role
	Proficiency in English
	Excellent knowledge of MS Office
	Thorough understanding of marketing and negotiating techniques
	Fast learner and a passion for sales
	Self-motivated with a results-driven approach
	Aptitude in delivering attractive presentations
	Degree in Engineering Preferred.


Remuneration


	Start up on N100,000.00 monthly gross
	3.5% commission on the profit of every closed deal
	To be reviewed after six months, based on performance.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: maryjanekalu86@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
